card.name: Ashiok, Wicked Manipulator
card.text: If you would pay life while your library has at least that many cards in it, exile that many cards from the top of your library instead. +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Exile one of them and put the other into your hand. −2: Create two 1/1 black Nightmare creature tokens with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, if a card was put into exile this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." −7: Target player exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the total mana value of cards you own in exile.

card.name: Ashiok, Wicked Manipulator
card.text: If you would pay life while your library has at least that many cards in it, exile that many cards from the top of your library instead. +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Exile one of them and put the other into your hand. −2: Create two 1/1 black Nightmare creature tokens with "At the beginning of combat on your turn, if a card was put into exile this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." −7: Target player exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the total mana value of cards you own in exile.

card.name: Beseech the Mirror
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Search your library for a card, exile it face down, then shuffle. If this spell was bargained, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost if that spell's mana value is 4 or less. Put the exiled card into your hand if it wasn't cast this way.

card.name: Break the Spell
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. If a permanent you controlled or a token was destroyed this way, draw a card.

card.name: Conceited Witch
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Cursed Courtier
card.text: Lifelink When Cursed Courtier enters the battlefield, create a Cursed Role token attached to it. (Enchanted creature is 1/1.)

card.name: Embereth Veteran
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Embereth Veteran: Create a Young Hero Role token attached to another target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, if its toughness is 3 or less, put a +1/+1 counter on it.")

card.name: Expel the Interlopers
card.text: Choose a number between 0 and 10. Destroy all creatures with power greater than or equal to the chosen number.

card.name: Expel the Interlopers
card.text: Choose a number between 0 and 10. Destroy all creatures with power greater than or equal to the chosen number.

card.name: Expel the Interlopers
card.text: Choose a number between 0 and 10. Destroy all creatures with power greater than or equal to the chosen number.

card.name: Faerie Dreamthief
card.text: Flying When Faerie Dreamthief enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {2}{B}, Exile Faerie Dreamthief from your graveyard: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Faerie Dreamthief
card.text: Flying When Faerie Dreamthief enters the battlefield, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) {2}{B}, Exile Faerie Dreamthief from your graveyard: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Gallant Pie-Wielder
card.text: First strike Celebration — Gallant Pie-Wielder has double strike as long as two or more nonland permanents entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

card.name: Glass Casket
card.text: When Glass Casket enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less until Glass Casket leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Knight of Doves
card.text: Whenever an enchantment you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Lich-Knights' Conquest
card.text: Sacrifice any number of artifacts, enchantments, and/or tokens. Return that many creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Lich-Knights' Conquest
card.text: Sacrifice any number of artifacts, enchantments, and/or tokens. Return that many creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Living Lectern
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Living Lectern: Draw a card. Create a Sorcerer Role token attached to up to one other target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, scry 1")

card.name: Moonshaker Cavalry
card.text: Flying When Moonshaker Cavalry enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain flying and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Moonshaker Cavalry
card.text: Flying When Moonshaker Cavalry enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain flying and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Restless Fortress
card.text: Restless Fortress enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {2}{W}{B}: Restless Fortress becomes a 1/4 white and black Nightmare creature until end of turn. It's still a land. Whenever Restless Fortress attacks, defending player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Restless Fortress
card.text: Restless Fortress enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {2}{W}{B}: Restless Fortress becomes a 1/4 white and black Nightmare creature until end of turn. It's still a land. Whenever Restless Fortress attacks, defending player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Rowan's Grim Search
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) If this spell was bargained, look at the top four cards of your library, then put up to two of them back on top of your library in any order and the rest into your graveyard. You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Stroke of Midnight
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Human creature token.

card.name: Stroke of Midnight
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Human creature token.

card.name: Sweettooth Witch
card.text: When Sweettooth Witch enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {2}, Sacrifice a Food: Target player loses 2 life.

card.name: Talion, the Kindly Lord
card.text: Flying As Talion, the Kindly Lord enters the battlefield, choose a number between 1 and 10. Whenever an opponent casts a spell with mana value, power, or toughness equal to the chosen number, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.

card.name: Talion, the Kindly Lord
card.text: Flying As Talion, the Kindly Lord enters the battlefield, choose a number between 1 and 10. Whenever an opponent casts a spell with mana value, power, or toughness equal to the chosen number, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.

card.name: Tanglespan Lookout
card.text: Whenever an Aura enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.name: Tanglespan Lookout
card.text: Whenever an Aura enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.name: Three Blind Mice
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.) I — Create a 1/1 white Mouse creature token. II — Create a token that's a copy of target token you control. III — Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Torch the Tower
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Torch the Tower deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1. If a permanent dealt damage by Torch the Tower would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Torch the Tower
card.text: Bargain (You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.) Torch the Tower deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If this spell was bargained, instead it deals 3 damage to that permanent and you scry 1. If a permanent dealt damage by Torch the Tower would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Tough Cookie
card.text: When Tough Cookie enters the battlefield, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") {2}{G}: Target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature until end of turn. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Tough Cookie: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Twisted Fealty
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Create a Wicked Role token attached to up to one target creature. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. When this Aura is put into a graveyard, each opponent loses 1 life.)
